function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relocation of health care personnel (HCP) to new AIIRs","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide proper training, protective equipment, and support for HCP","Technologies":"Air purification systems, negative pressure rooms","People":"Health care personnel (HCP)","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Sharing devices and equipment among HCP","Impact":"Potential cross-contamination and spread of infections","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning protocols and regular disinfection of equipment","Technologies":"High-level disinfectants, UV sterilization systems","People":"Health care personnel (HCP)","Owner":"Infection control team"},{"Description":"Comparison and publication of infection rates","Impact":"Potential stigmatization or unfair comparison of facilities","Mitigation":"Focus on sharing best practices and continuous improvement rather than individual facility performance","Technologies":"Data analysis and reporting tools","People":"Health care personnel (HCP), hospital management","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
